snippet.title: FAITH UPDATE v1.4: GOOD CHRISTIAN BOY (AVAILABLE NOW)
snippet.description:
⛧ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1179080/FAITH_The_Unholy_Trinity/ ⛧

Praise the UNSPEAKABLE! One year after the release of FAITH: The Unholy Trinity, it's time for a new challenge! In the new SURVIVAL mode, fight through an all-new environment facing every last demon we can throw at you. Can you escape with your life...and get the highest rank?

This v1.4 update includes the new SURVIVAL mode, a new hidden mode (!), new animated cutscenes, a new background to unlock, a brand-new music track, and more...tis

Follow Airdorf Games: https://twitter.com/airdorf
New Blood Discord: https://t.co/OiNbugZD42
Get Merch: https://newbloodstore.com/collections/faith
